Interface ReviewRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<ReviewEntity, String>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<ReviewEntity, String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<ReviewEntity, String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<ReviewEntity, String>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<ReviewEntity, String>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<ReviewEntity>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<ReviewEntity, String>
@Repository public interface ReviewRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<ReviewEntity, String>

  • Method Details

    • findByReviewedUserIdOrderByCreatedAtDesc

      @Query("SELECT r FROM ReviewEntity r WHERE r.reviewedUser.id = :userId ORDER BY r.createdAt DESC") List<ReviewEntity> findByReviewedUserIdOrderByCreatedAtDesc(@Param("userId") Long userId)
      Find all reviews received by a specific user (reviews about them)

    • findByReviewerIdOrderByCreatedAtDesc

      @Query("SELECT r FROM ReviewEntity r WHERE r.reviewer.id = :userId ORDER BY r.createdAt DESC") List<ReviewEntity> findByReviewerIdOrderByCreatedAtDesc(@Param("userId") Long userId)
      Find all reviews given by a specific user (reviews they wrote)

    • findByReviewedUserIdOrderByCreatedAtDesc

      @Query("SELECT r FROM ReviewEntity r WHERE r.reviewedUser.id = :userId ORDER BY r.createdAt DESC") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ReviewEntity> findByReviewedUserIdOrderByCreatedAtDesc(@Param("userId") Long userId, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Find reviews received by a user with pagination

    • findByReviewerIdOrderByCreatedAtDesc

      @Query("SELECT r FROM ReviewEntity r WHERE r.reviewer.id = :userId ORDER BY r.createdAt DESC") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ReviewEntity> findByReviewerIdOrderByCreatedAtDesc(@Param("userId") Long userId, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Find reviews given by a user with pagination

    • findByOfferId

      Optional<ReviewEntity> findByOfferId(String offerId)
      Find review for a specific offer

    • findByOfferIdAndReviewerId

      @Query("SELECT r FROM ReviewEntity r WHERE r.offer.id = :offerId AND r.reviewer.id = :reviewerId") Optional<ReviewEntity> findByOfferIdAndReviewerId(@Param("offerId") String offerId, @Param("reviewerId") Long reviewerId)
      Check if a review exists for a specific offer and reviewer

    • getAverageRatingForUser

      @Query("SELECT AVG(r.score) FROM ReviewEntity r WHERE r.reviewedUser.id = :userId") Optional<Double> getAverageRatingForUser(@Param("userId") Long userId)
      Get average rating for a user

    • getTotalReviewsForUser

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(r) FROM ReviewEntity r WHERE r.reviewedUser.id = :userId") Long getTotalReviewsForUser(@Param("userId") Long userId)
      Get total number of reviews for a user

    • findReviewsBetweenUsers

      @Query("SELECT r FROM ReviewEntity r WHERE (r.reviewer.id = :user1Id AND r.reviewedUser.id = :user2Id) OR (r.reviewer.id = :user2Id AND r.reviewedUser.id = :user1Id) ORDER BY r.createdAt DESC") List<ReviewEntity> findReviewsBetweenUsers(@Param("user1Id") Long user1Id, @Param("user2Id") Long user2Id)
      Get reviews between two users

    • canUserReviewUser

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(o) > 0 FROM OfferEntity o WHERE o.status = 'COMPLETED' AND ((o.user.id = :reviewerId AND o.listing.creator.id = :reviewedUserId) OR (o.listing.creator.id = :reviewerId AND o.user.id = :reviewedUserId))") boolean canUserReviewUser(@Param("reviewerId") Long reviewerId, @Param("reviewedUserId") Long reviewedUserId)
      Check if user can review another user (they had a completed transaction)

    • findReviewableOffersBetweenUsers

      @Query("SELECT o FROM OfferEntity o WHERE o.status = 'COMPLETED' AND ((o.user.id = :user1Id AND o.listing.creator.id = :user2Id) OR (o.listing.creator.id = :user1Id AND o.user.id = :user2Id)) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT r FROM ReviewEntity r WHERE r.offer.id = o.id AND r.reviewer.id = :reviewerId) ORDER BY o.updatedAt DESC") List<Object> findReviewableOffersBetweenUsers(@Param("user1Id") Long user1Id, @Param("user2Id") Long user2Id, @Param("reviewerId") Long reviewerId)
      Get completed offers between two users that haven't been reviewed yet

    • findByReviewedUserIdAndCreatedAtBetween

      List<ReviewEntity> findByReviewedUserIdAndCreatedAtBetween(Long reviewedUserId, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end)
